item.title: ‘Hard Knocks’ Boss on Josh Allen Wedding “Pipe Dream” and Barely Missing Out on Visit From the Killers
item.description: NFL Films producer Pat Harris tells The Hollywood Reporter about the team’s tough player cuts and why a shout-out to the Killers’ song “Mr. Brightside” caused a minor controversy for fans.
